attributes.action: Stop the proposed ‘clean air tax’ in Newcastle, Gateshead & Tyneside
attributes.additional_details:
Enough is enough!

Leave us and our roads alone!

We already pay enough tax! 

Sign the petition and let’s stop this together!

More information at www.breathe-cleanair.com
attributes.background:
North East Councils’ are proposing a ‘clean air tax’ which will see drivers having to pay to cross the bridges over the Tyne and pay a congestion charge to enter Newcastle & Gateshead.
This is nothing but yet another tax on everyday working people and businesses who use these vital routes everyday!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Newcastle, Gateshead and North Tyneside's local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
